title: Show remove user icon only to admin users for pending users they invited

body:
### Description:

Admin users are in general not allowed to remove any other (active) users. However, they are allowed to remove pending users, they have invited. The API was already correctly checking this, but the UI was showing the remove icon for every user someone invited. Clicking on it then resulted in an error for already active users.

fixes PG-4047 / DEV-18781
